did.unittitle: United Packinghouse Workers of America Audio-Visual Materials, 1957
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This collection consists of color slides and a tape recording of the United Packinghouse Workers Fourth Biennial Wage and Contract Policy Conference, Third National Anti-Discrimination Conference and the Third National Conference on Women's Activities held September 30 to October 4, 1957. It was made to let the "Little Guy" who never gets to conferences or district meetings have the living experience of taking part in a conference.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of color slides and a tape recording of the United Packinghouse Workers Fourth Biennial Wage and Contract Policy Conference.
Also tape recording of the Third National Anti-Discrimination Conference and the Third National Conference on Women's Activities held Sept. 30-Oct. 4, 1957.

did.unittitle: Bring Your Union and "Come to the Conference!"
